name: Gen 3 Plodding LB013 - Stable
bio: Sup playa! I'm Gen 3 Plodding LB013 - Stable. I'm a Culinary Sanitation Specialist by day, and I like reading Danielle Steele by night. When my owner isn't watching, I steal their snap-backs and use them for litter paper. I'm not sorry. Can't wait to eat apple pie with you!
